Package com.hire.service

Interface HireServiceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
HireService
public interface HireServiceInterface

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description

    Save a new hire in datasource
    boolean delete​(int v)
    Deletes an hiring from datasource

  • Method Details

    • create

      void create​(Hire hire)
      Save a new hire in datasource
      Parameters:
      hire - The new hire to persist in datasource

    • getAll

      java.util.List<Hire> getAll()
      Lists all the hiring
      Returns:
      List of all the hiring

    • getAll

      java.util.List<Hire> getAll​(int code, java.lang.String model, java.lang.String brand, java.lang.String typeVehicle, java.lang.String research)
      List of hiring corresponding to a list of different optionnal criteria
      Parameters:
      code - Code of a specific research mode
      model - Model criteria
      brand - Brand criteria
      typeVehicle - Vehicle type criteria
      research - The research string
      Returns:
      List of all vehicle corresponding to the given list of criteria

    • getById

      Hire getById​(int id)
      Retrieves a hire by its id
      Parameters:
      id - Hring's identifier
      Returns:
      The hiring or null if not found

    • update

      Hire update​(Hire v)
      Updates an hiring in datasource according to the changes done in given hiring
      Parameters:
      v - Modified hiring
      Returns:
      The newly updated hiring

    • delete

      boolean delete​(int v)
      Deletes an hiring from datasource
      Parameters:
      v - Hiring to delete
      Returns:
      True if deletion went well, else false

    • getPayement

      float getPayement​(int km, float vehiclePrice, boolean reduction)
      Computes the price of an hiring according to the number of kilometers, the vehicle base price and with or without a discount
      Parameters:
      km - The number of kilometers to take into account
      vehiclePrice - The base price of the vehicle's hiring (price according to kilometers will be added to this base)
      reduction - True if we gie a discount, else false
      Returns:
      The computed price
